scenario.name: newmethod
scenario.send: OPTIONS sip:[remote_ip] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:[field0]@[local_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[field0]@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] OPTIONS Contact: sip:sipp@[local_ip]:[local_port] Max-Forwards: 10 User-Agent: SIPp/Linux Content-Length: 0 Accept: text/plain
